instruction: Analyze the given poem and rewrite it with a new title and an altered tone.
input:
Title: "Lost"

I stare out into the void,
Searching for a life I never employed.

My path is a long, sad descent,
Words mean nothing as I relent.
output:
Title: "Found" 

I gaze upon the view ahead,
Ready to take on a life I never dread.

My journey may be long and hard,
But I'm determined to make my mark.
